content.text: Bornecks were Near-Humans who inhabited Vellity. Their skin tones varied from pale yellow to orange-brown. They were patient, sensible pacifists, and farmers who enjoyed hard work and holidays. They lived to an average of one hundred twenty standard years. Danetta Pitta hid the fact that he had a Borneck ancestor.
Many Bornecks migrated to the agriworld of Draenell's Point.

elements.text: "Who's Who: Imperial Grand Admirals"—Star Wars Insider 66
